Proprietary_Formats: .reqif (Often used by DOORS Next, Jama, Polarion for round-trip)
Metadata: Author, Creation/Modified date, Project Name/ID, Version/Revision, Approval Status

Data_Exchange: SPARQL/RDF (Some tools adopt semantic web standards)

Attributes: Priority, Status, Owner, Category (Functional, Safety, Performance)
Traceability_Links: Links to design elements (UML/SysML models, test cases)
Dependencies (Derived from REQ-001, parent of REQ-012, etc.)
Verification_Activity: Test case references (TST-101, TST-102), Completion status (Passed/Failed)
Change_History: Version number, date/time of changes, change author, revision comments
